content: अनुगुण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अनुकूलो गुणो यस्य] Having similar qualities, of the same nature; कांतारतापसाविक्षू वंशकानुगुणौ स्मृतौ <ls>Suśr.</ls>; conformable to, favourable or agreeable to, suitable, according to; मनोरथस्यानुगुणं सर्वदा यस्य चेष्टितं <ls>Mv. 7. 7</ls> obedient to the will; <ls n="Mv.">7. 38</ls>; गुणसंपदानुगुणतां गमितः <ls>Ki. 6. 33</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">10. 13</ls>; congenial, suitable, fit; °अन्नलाभात् <ls>Dk. 64</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">94</ls>; अननुगुणदाराणां <ls>Dk. 130</ls> not having wives worthy of themselves; (वीणा) उत्कंठितस्य हृदयानुगुणा वयस्या <ls>Mk. 3. 3</ls> agreeable or pleasing to the heart, exactly after the heart (<ls>Tv.</ls> here takes °णा to mean तंत्रीयुक्तवीणा itself); अत्र द्वावप्युपध्मानीयावेव न शांतानुगुणौ <ls>R. G.</ls>; रसानुगुणतामेति <ls>S. D.</ls>; °णं सर्वास्ववस्थासु यत् <ls>U. 1. 39</ls> --णः A natural peculiarity. --णं {%<ab>adv.</ab>%} {@--1@} Favourably, conformably to one's desires; चिरेणानुगुणं प्रोक्ता प्रतिपत्तिपराङ्मुखी <ls>Bk. 8. 95.</ls> {@--2@} Agreeably or conformably to (in <ab>comp.</ab>); तदादेशानुगुणं भवदागमनमभूत् <ls>Dk. 11.</ls> {@--3@} Naturally.
